dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The room is spotlessly clean and empty, save for a steel table and two chairs. In one of them is a slumped figure. We see his bloody, slightly burnt finger tips drumming aw on the table, but other than that, he’s motionless. The door opens, and a young CIA ANALYST, in a suit and looking very official, comes in carrying a file, and sits down across from the figure.

dialogues.speaker: ANALYST
dialogues.text: Normally we would do this digitally, but as you know, I am not permitted to bring in any kind of blunt or pointed object. (glances through the file) I’m sure you’ve noticed the seats are bolted to the floor... The figure doesn’t move or speak.

dialogues.speaker: ANALYST, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: So we’re going to do this the old- fashioned way. He opens the file, and spills out a number of very high definition photographs, and begins sorting and separating them, sliding them around on the smooth metal surface. He stares down at the ordered photos. Among others, we see: A bloody iPhone. A bloody ring of car keys. A completely demolished kitchen, swiss cheesed with bulletholes. A bod hanging from a resistance training machine. A bloody spoo A teddy bear with an exploded head and a shotgun shoved u its ass. A burning Wal-Mart. His face is blank, staring at them, and then he allows a small expression of “hm, what the fuck” to peek out.

dialogues.speaker: ANALYST, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Okay. Where do you want to begin?

The other asset, he sprays with more Raid and then bashes him with the can before jumping over him into THE HARDWARE AISLE, where he’s confronted by the remainin four assets-

dialogues.speaker: KABOOM
dialogues.text: When the smoke clears, noise is gone, replaced by a pierc ringing, and everything is colorfully on fire. Mike stand up, grabbing a rubber mallet off a burning shelf, and wal through the assets, SMASHING THEIR HEADS LIKE WHACKAMOLE they start to recover. Yates, seeing Mike approaching looking like the mother- fuckering terminator, grabs Phoebe by the hair and yanks to her feet.

dialogues.speaker: MIKE
dialogues.text: (to Laugher) For fucksakes, KILL HIM.

dialogues.speaker: LAUGHER
dialogues.text: Yeah okay. Laugher starts towards Mike, as Yates retreats back into Employees Only hallway. ...-But Mike is suddenly gone. Laugher looks around, confused.

dialogues.speaker: LAUGHER, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: -..-Don’t hide. Come out. Don’t hide. I want to talk to you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yates hurls Phoebe into the hallway, she hits the walls h her head banging off, leaving a smear of blood. Yates sla the door behind him, locking it.

dialogues.speaker: PHOEBE
dialogues.text: OwW- OW--— Yates tries to grab her and she swats his hand away.  98.

dialogues.speaker: YATES
dialogues.text: What?

dialogues.speaker: PHOEBE
dialogues.text: You're the worst fucking- CHRIST do you see how stupid you are? You can't even see it you're still sure that you're going to come out on top, WELL YOU'RE NOT, ADRIAN.

dialogues.speaker: SMOKE, YOU'RE GOING TO DIE-
dialogues.text: Yates grabs Phoebe’s head, and smashes it against the wal SPLAT, and she drops to her knees.

dialogues.speaker: YATES
dialogues.text: Look at you. Pathetic, And you “hate me?” What are you, fucking fourteen years old- Yates tries to grab her head again and Phoebe blocks and for the throat. Yates jumps backwards, startled. Phoebe looks at him through bangs of bloody hair.

dialogues.speaker: YATES, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Fuck. What's that about, fuck you- Yates tries to smash her head again, and AGAIN PHOEBE BLO

dialogues.speaker: AND GOES FOR THE THROAT- SHIT MAN, FUCK
dialogues.text: Yates leaps back.

dialogues.speaker: YATES, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Man, fuck this. And fuck you, Selburg. They’1ll be fucking laughing at your dead pothead ass tomorrow morning in the debriefing. Tarzan, you can fucking burn with your ape. Yates spits on her, and starts to walk away. Phoebe, on h knees, concussed and bloody, let’s out a weird low laugh.

dialogues.speaker: PHOEBE
dialogues.text: (sing song) You're gonna diiiiieeeeee (laughs ) ADRIIIIANNNN, you're gonna diiieee-  99.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Laugher is looking around the burning Wal-Mart.

dialogues.speaker: LAUGHER
dialogues.text: Were you crazy too? Were you a person who was exceptional like me or are you a different type of exceptional, do you...can you move me? Will you move me? I feel like I need to be moved, you know, please move me-

dialogues.speaker: MIKE ATTACKS- LAUGHER BLOCKS-
dialogues.text: Listen, I’ve written a lot of action here. You know it, I know it, and I want this script to be under 110 pages because, c’mon, it’s Stoner Bourne, not Kafka. This isn’t Kafka, okay? They have guys...There are like, fight coordinators, guys can make this look awesome. This isn’t a comic book. We a know ultimately it’s going to come down to what we can sh on the day anyway, right? So just take my word for it that the fight between Mike a Laugher makes any of the action in the new James Bond fil look like fucking 1960s Batman. It’s violent, it’s incredible, they beat the living shit out of each other, it ends with them REPEATEDLY STABBING EACH OTHER WITH SCREWDRIVERS before M BURIES A CLAW HAMMER INTO LAUGHER'S FOREHEAD, and then collapses, seemingly dead.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yates is running, frantic. He gets about twenty feet, repeatedly looking behind him, spinning and running STRAI INTO KRUEGER.

dialogues.speaker: KRUEGER
dialogues.text: Hello Adrian.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Phoebe slowly moves through the back of the burning Wal-M discovering Mike laying face down on the ground.

dialogues.speaker: PHOEBE
dialogues.text: Mike. Mike. Hey.  112 100.

dialogues.speaker: MIKE
dialogues.text: Hey Phoebe.

dialogues.speaker: PHOEBE
dialogues.text: Do you want to...leave Wal-Mart?

dialogues.speaker: MIKE
dialogues.text: ...Yeah...I guess, yeah.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Phoebe, supporting Mike, exits Wal-Mart, and is immediate HIT BY MULTIPLE SPOTLIGHTS. She squints against the light, and turns, seeing Krueger, nearby, surrounded by Seal Team 6, with Lasseter and Yate handcuffed on their knees in front of him. Phoebe looks around, dazed. The Wal-Mart burning behind them, Black Hawk choppers in air overhead, dozens of military vehicles and cop cars ar parked into the lot, it’s CRAZY. They are ready to take d God himself out here.

dialogues.speaker: PHOEBE
dialogues.text: I wanted you to break your training. You know that right? I wanted you to come to Hawaii with me, I hoped you'd be able to get through it, I believed in you-

dialogues.speaker: MIKE
dialogues.text: I know. Lasseter told me.

dialogues.speaker: PHOEBE
dialogues.text: What? Lasseter, you saw Lasseter- Mike drops to one knee, clearly about to pass out.

dialogues.speaker: PHOEBE, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Mike, are you- He produces the ring box.

dialogues.speaker: MIKE
dialogues.text: Are you want to...marry me? Phoebe looks around, breathing hard, and immediately begi to cry, wiping blood off her face.  113 114 101.

dialogues.speaker: MIKE, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Don’t cry. It’s perfect. This is all just...this is perfect.

dialogues.speaker: PHOEBE
dialogues.text: I'm sorry...

dialogues.speaker: MIKE

dialogues.speaker: PHOEBE

dialogues.speaker: MIKE
dialogues.text: (thrilled) Hey! SHE SAID YES! WwOOO- Mike is HIT WITH A BOUT A MILLION TAZERS, DROPPED INSTANT

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The room is spotlessly clean and empty, save for a stainl steel table and two chairs. In one of them is Mike. He’s been cleaned up and bandaged, but he’s still a total mess. Bloody, slightly burnt finger tips drumming away on the steel, but other than that, he’s motionless. The door opens, and a young CIA ANALYST, in a suit and looking very official, comes in carrying a file, and sits down across from the Mike.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yates and Lasseter, still all fucked up, are being driven somewhere. They’re let out ina

dialogues.speaker: SNOWY FIELD
dialogues.text: In the middle of the woods. It’s about noon on a cold, gr day. Both of them are shivering. They stand there with one another in silence. Krueger cle his throat, startling them.  102.

dialogues.speaker: KRUEGER
dialogues.text: Diane Lasseter. Adrian Yates.

dialogues.speaker: YATES LASSETER
dialogues.text: Hello sir- Good morning-

dialogues.speaker: KRUEGER, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Shhhhhhhh. Krueger regards them both, shivering there in the cold, w he himself is dressed warmly, and looks comfortable.

dialogues.speaker: KRUEGER, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: All right. He checks his watch. The timer is at 3 HOURS 40 MINUTES.

dialogues.speaker: KRUEGER, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Let's wrap this up. Lasseter can’t hide an involuntary chill.

dialogues.speaker: LASSETER
dialogues.text: I just want to say, sir, that Peter Douglas should not have his actions in the past twenty four hours held against him. I manipulated Douglas-

dialogues.speaker: KRUEGER
dialogues.text: To betray the United States and the direct orders of his commanding officer?

dialogues.speaker: KRUEGER
dialogues.text: Douglas will be dealt with when he’s dealt with. You, on the other hand directly interfered in a government operation. Unsanctioned, without notification, without authorization, you killed an American Government Operative, and share indirect accountability for the deaths of seven civilians and seventeen government assets. Is that correct?

dialogues.speaker: LASSETER
dialogues.text: Yes, but sir, I felt Yates was-—

dialogues.speaker: KRUEGER
dialogues.text: Shhh.  103.

dialogues.speaker: YATES
dialogues.text: Thanks to Lasseter alerting asset “Howl,” seven American citizens were killed in the-

dialogues.speaker: KRUEGER
dialogues.text: -Operation you created and spearheaded, without any direct authorization-

dialogues.speaker: YATES
dialogues.text: Yes sir, but you have to understand, I was self starting. You see opportunities, you take them; what am I supposed to do other than take opportunities? You weren’t gonna authorize some multibillion dollar test in Europe, Asia, so I started here, with people we already had deemed expendable. Yes, maybe I took shortcuts, maybe I made mistakes, but in the end, I was doing what I understood that I needed to do to create a cost-efficient exploit of a system already put in place. I know maybe I didn’t have “permission” or whatever, but if I'd pulled this off, you'd be thanking me. You'd be fucking THANKING ME, right? Am I right? After a beat, Krueger nods. CIA is shady like that.

dialogues.speaker: YATES, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: This is what the problem is, is that somebody created an environment where I was made to look foolish. It was an unpredictable environment; I didn’t account for Diane Lasseter and Phoebe Selburg betraying their country, their ideals, and this agency in defense of a wash-out stoned nonfunctional asset, I acted to the best of my abilities and in the best interest of national security-  104.

dialogues.speaker: KRUEGER
dialogues.text: And was this before or after you created a fake malaria panic, attempted to order a drone strike on a American soil and wiped out an entire small town police force?

dialogues.speaker: YATES
dialogues.text: Well sir, it’s complicated.

dialogues.speaker: KRUEGER
dialogues.text: No it isn’t.

dialogues.speaker: YATES
dialogues.text: With all due respect, yes it is. With all due respect, you weren't fucking there. You haven’t read the file, there is no file yet, you haven't read the logs, you have no fucking clue the kind of bullshit I've been dealing with from these two psycho bitches, and I- Krueger draws a pistol and shoots Yates three times in th chest. Lasseter stifles a scream. Yates drops, falling onto his back. Yates lays in the snow, shocked, bleeding, dying, and Kru goes and stands over him.

dialogues.speaker: YOU WAS PUT IN CHARGE OF ANYTHING
dialogues.text: You cost the taxpayers money, and worse than that, you KILL TAXPAYERS, and then you're going to tell ME I don't have a clue? I'm so happy and relieved that I just killed you, because now there's no paperwork, you just FUCKING DIE,

dialogues.speaker: FUCKING PROBLEM.
dialogues.text: Yates dies. Krueger straightens himself, and turns to Lasseter, who's shaking.  105.

dialogues.speaker: LASSETER
dialogues.text: Sir. I don’t know if this is appropriate to say, but please, please, please do not kill me.

dialogues.speaker: KRUEGER
dialogues.text: You know there’s a strong chance that’s exactly what’s going to happen.

dialogues.speaker: LASSETER
dialogues.text: Yes sir. There’s a beat, Krueger staring Yates’ body.

dialogues.speaker: KRUEGER
dialogues.text: I’m your source. Lasseter widely hides any kind of reaction.

dialogues.speaker: KRUEGER, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: (long beat) When I called you to notify you the sweep was happening, I did it out respect and courtesy. You’ve made me regret that now. (beat) There is a universe where this is all my fault. But since no one knows that am I am your source, and no one will ever know that I am your source, we are not living in that universe, understood?

dialogues.speaker: LASSETER
dialogues.text: -yes sir-

dialogues.speaker: KRUEGER
dialogues.text: My intention was not for you to act like fool child moron and try to save your puppy, the puppy was being put down, I was notifying you of the puppy’s death, not asking you to save the puppy, nor implying that I’d vindicate you saving the puppy. Well the puppy just shit all over everything and lit a Wal- Mart on fire. You have a crazy, scary, rabid puppy that murders people. It’s a bad puppy, and will still need to be put down. You understand that, correct?  106.

dialogues.speaker: LASSETER
dialogues.text: ..-yes sir-

dialogues.speaker: KRUEGER
dialogues.text: Douglas, hell, Douglas might be okay. He called me. You better pray you can find a way to turn this into a win. You better pray and sweat and pull a miracle out of your ass, a fucking Bethlehem make me believe shock the world miracle, because if you can’t... (indicates Yates) That’s you. That’s you. Krueger turns, getting ready to walk away, trudging up th hill. Lasseter steels herself.

dialogues.speaker: LASSETER
dialogues.text: You already have your miracle, sir. Krueger stops dead, and turns back to Lasseter. LASSETER (CONT’D) My project worked. Wiseman returned on its investment, even if it wasn’t in the way we expected. Mike Howell dismantled the entire Toughguy program singlehandedly. That makes him the most effective asset ANY of the Ultra programs have ever seen. In sixty years. (Krueger is listening) Pardon me for saying this sir, but that is a puppy worth saving. That is a two hundred million dollar puppy. (beat) And you have him sitting in a holding cell right now. Krueger just stares at her. Yates lays dead between them. The wind howls on the snowy field. Yates reaches down, an clicks off the timer on his wristwatch. INT. LASSETER’S HOUSE - LATER 115 Scott is sitting up on the couch, watching the news, whic debunking the “false malaria panic” created by a “disgrun CDC employee.” He’s clearly been up all night. The door opens, and the alarm goes off, startling him. Sc rushes over the foyer, and sees Lasseter coming in.  107. scott Mom? Lasseter turns, clearly exhausted, and Scott rushes and h her tight. Lasseter hugs him back, and begins crying, mor exhausted than emotional. She laughs, repeatedly kissing the top of Scotts head. FADE TO BLACK.

Mike’s hair a little longer. Mike gets up, and Phoebe waves to him as walks up to the bathrooms. Mike gives her thumbs up, and goes inside, only to be

Mike, on his knees, has a ba pulled off his head, and finds himself facing an INTERNATIONAL CRIMINAL, impeccably dressed, looking like of Ocean's Eleven. Goons flank him on all sides. One of them approaches the boss.

dialogues.speaker: GOON
dialogues.text: All he had on him was this. The goon shows the International Criminal a napkin with a picture of Rocket Monkey drawn on it that says “FUCK YOU.

dialogues.text: This is it? This is him? How far has the CIA fallen, that they send one man. Who are you? Are you James Bond? Did they really think they could sneak up on ME? I am Robertito Lazaniafrespasda. And what do they send? A TOURIST.  108. The goons laugh. Mike looks around the room; knives on th counter, skewers in a cupboard, pans hanging, sausages hanging, open flame on the grills, a tray of dirty forks knives and spoons, a pile of plates. INTERNATIONAL CRIMINAL (CONT’D) One man. One UNARMED man. Mike laughs to himself weirdly. INTERNATIONAL CRIMINAL (CONT’D) Something funny?

dialogues.speaker: MIKE
dialogues.text: I’m sorry. (beat) I’m just so fucking high right now. The criminal reacts: “What?” And then MIKE SUDDENLY LUNGE

dialogues.text: CUE: “EXTREME WAYS” BY MOBY THE END. AFTER CREDITS...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MAURY Povitch is interviewing Rose, who’s seated next to big fat chinese woman who looks mad. Up on a big screen there’s an image of a half-chinese baby.

dialogues.speaker: MAURY
dialogues.text: Well, the test results are in. Rose, do you still deny you are the father?

dialogues.speaker: ROSE
dialogues.text: That's right, it is unfeasible that that baby could be mine.

dialogues.speaker: MAURY
dialogues.text: Unfeasible, really?  109.

dialogues.speaker: ROSE
dialogues.text: Yes sir. Yes sir Maury, I was involved in an incident, a violent incident ten months ago, clandestine and sworn to secrecy, but it has left me unfertile.

dialogues.speaker: MAURY
dialogues.text: Unfertile?

dialogues.speaker: ROSE
dialogues.text: Yes sir unfertile and barren.

dialogues.speaker: MAURY
dialogues.text: Okay. In the case of one month old baby Dim Dom Kwang... (opens folder) You are NOT the father! Heavy music comes on, the camera moves all around as Rose jumps up and starts dancing. SLAM TO BLACK.
